name: @cyberpath/sentinel
description: JavaScript/TypeScript bindings for Cyberpath Sentinel DBMS - Native N-API bindings for Node.js

scripts.build: cargo build --release -p sentinel-js && cp crates/sentinel-js/target/release/*.node native/ 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.build:debug: cargo build -p sentinel-js && cp crates/sentinel-js/target/debug/*.node native/ 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.postinstall: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); const ext = process.platform === 'win32' ? '.dll' : process.platform === 'darwin' ? '.dylib' : '.so'; const file = fs.readdirSync('native').find(f => f.endsWith(ext)); if(file) { const content = fs.readFileSync('native/' + file); fs.writeFileSync('dist/index.node', content); }")
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run build && npm run bundle

author: Emanuele (Ebalo) Balsamo <emanuele.balsamo@cyberpath-hq.com>
